text_block_list.text: Splendid! It looks like you're steadily collecting trophies!
text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa

text_block_list.text: Hahahaha! Just as I expected when I took you on!
text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa

text_block_list.text: Gratitude! We have taken another step forward toward my endless dream!
text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa

text_block_list.text: However! The number of trophies is still too few to fill this room with light!
text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa

text_block_list.text: Continuation! I ask that you keep up that pace from now on as well!!
text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
